desc: What can you do with 100 sats?

msgs.text: What can you do with 100 sats?

100 sats roughly what I earn in a 5 day work week.

sMiles is an app that tracks your steps(location) and pays you in sats, with a max of 21 per day.

I was off on Friday ðŸ˜‚

Proof of Walk
100 sats is $100 when the price of Bitcoin goes to $100 million
<@874693941562318858>  I guess you could buy two pennies with 100 sats, assuming someone would take that trade.
I think u can use those 100 sats in the web stacker.news. I'm not sure but i was watching that comments cost a small quantity of sats
Are we gonna see that? Or our grandchilds?

that's really cool! The micropayments over lightning are going to take on quickly.. Think about all the microtransactions in video games, live streaming and receiving tips.. 

Why would you stream and get Amazon-owned Twitch.tv KYC bits when you could get sats tipped straight to Muun
Yes! You can upvote comments for as little as 1 sat. Replying to a thread costs 10 sats

https://addslice.com/?crew=ZmbVg

I just found this browser extension that plays ads in the background, rewards you with "Slices"

After 30 days of accrual you can withdraw via lightning. I believe the defauly wallet they recommend is Zebedee (ZBD).

After 16 days I have just over 1000 sats.
